item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Pizzico on Hope Street!

Pizzico has been an institution on Hope Street in the Summit neighborhood of the East Side for a long time. Its upscale in a neighborhood way and the food is delicious! I checked it out the other day as I was doing MNM recon and was so pleased to see that they've renovated beautifully and have a wonderful, large bar area in the back complete with a cozy section with bistro tables and some high bench seating! It looks great! As a place to go for a terrific meal or just for a drink and apps, I think you'll like this one. Its a great spot, so let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Except Hurricane Sandy and NYE 2012.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a scarf or black cap in the picture, but we're not hard to find!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Pizzico on Hope Street!
